title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Instructional Design-Based Learning for Educational Software Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can describe the instructional software design process based on Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction.
Learners can develop simple educational software using authoring tools designed for non-programmers.
Learners can propose at least three computing-based instructional strategies to enhance learner engagement.
Learners can create software prototypes applicable to real educational settings through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
